constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 166 (Friday, September 24, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BACON:
H.R. 5358.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H5174]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Cybersecurity, Infrastructure Protection, and Innovation.

title: To direct the Secretary of Homeland Security to establish an election research program to test the security of election systems, and for other purposes.
